Class ModifiedSafraContainmentOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • org.svvrl.goal.core.Properties
            • org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.safra.SafraContainmentOptions
              • org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.safra.ModifiedSafraContainmentOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

    public class ModifiedSafraContainmentOptions
extends SafraContainmentOptions
    This class contains several options for the containment with the modified Safra's construction.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      boolean isMaxAcc()
      Returns true if the option of maximizing the Büchi acceptance set before containment is on.

      Returns true if the option of simplifying the input NBW based on simulation relations before the containment test is on.

      Returns true if the option of randomly exploring successors is on.
